title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Virgin and Child with Saints, Study after Gerolamo Marchesi", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 7 Bagna Cavallo Forl . On verso at center left [on statue's plinth]: MALATESTA
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Enthroned Madonna sits at center left, with child standing beside her. Kneeling bishop saint at lower left. At right, St. John standing with kneeling saint, or perhaps, donor. Painting which has arched top, formerly in Basilica of S. Mercuriale, Forli.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Virgin and Child with Saints, Study after Gerolamo Marchesi", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3487.
